discussiontools-replywidget-anon-warning: Ntabwo winjiye. Kwakira ibiranga izina ryawe aho kuba aderesi ya IP, ushobora kwinjira[$1] cyangwa [$2 ugakora konti].
discussiontools-replywidget-terms-click: Kanda "$1", kwemera kubijyanye no gukoresha iyi wiki.
discussiontools-error-comment-is-transcl: Ihuza"{{int:discussiontools-replylink}}" ntirishobora gukoreshwa mugusubiza iki gitekereo. kugirango usubize, koresha ikosora ry'urubuga ryuzuye ukanda "$1".
Ihuza"{{int:discussiontools-replylink}}" ntirishobora gukoreshwa mu guhuza iki gitekerezo kuko cyashyizwe kurundi rubuga. Kugirango usubize, jya hano: [[$1]].
discussiontools-error-lint: Ibitekerezo kuri uru rubuga ntibishora gusubizwa kubera ikosa muri wikitext. Ushobora kwiga ibyerekeye iri kosa ukoreshye [$1 usoma inyandiko], saba ubufasha ukoresheje [$2 wohereze hano] cyangwa ukosore ikosa ukoresheje [$3 gufungura ikosora ry'urubuga ryuzuye].
tag-discussiontools-edit-description: Umukoresha yakosoye igitekerezo gihari akoresheje DiscussionTools
tag-discussiontools-newtopic-description: Umukoresha yongeyeho ingingo nshya ku rubuga akoresheje DiscussionTools
